title: When a Nasus decides to test his Q damage on you at 25 mins in...

replies.body: You have been slain
Nasus's Q should do AoE damage around the point of impact, its radius increasing with stacks.

> [{quoted}](name=ScarletNocturne,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NJ5QwnUL,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-09-05T14:54:13.321+0000)
>
> Nasus's Q should do AoE damage around the point of impact, its radius increasing with stacks.

That would deffinately be a very balanced and not at all broken addition to his Q.// Reixis says, dripping with sarcasm.

Contrary, i think he should have a cap to the stacks he can get.

> [{quoted}](name=Reixis,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NJ5QwnUL,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2016-09-05T16:44:40.779+0000)
>
> That would deffinately be a very balanced and not at all broken addition to his Q.// Reixis says, dripping with sarcasm.
> 
> Contrary, i think he should have a cap to the stacks he can get.

It should be capped at a global shockwave.

> [{quoted}](name=ScarletNocturne,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NJ5QwnUL,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2016-09-05T16:53:45.976+0000)
>
> It should be capped at a global shockwave.

**When nasus reaches 750 stacks, his Q goes on a .1 second cooldown, in which he can target himself to create a global shockwave. Dealing 1 + (50% of AD) True damage to all units on the map, including structures. This damage cannot be prevented.

{{champion:32}} "Karthus, they're low, ult now!"
{{champion:30}} "Got it!"
{{champion:75}} "Q."

> [{quoted}](name=Reixis,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NJ5QwnUL,comment-id=0003000100000000,timestamp=2016-09-05T16:56:41.630+0000)
>
> **When nasus reaches 750 stacks, his Q goes on a .1 second cooldown, in which he can target himself to create a global shockwave. Dealing 1 + (50% of AD) True damage to all units on the map, including structures. This damage cannot be prevented.

the baron steal potential tho

It wouldn't be much damage though, if it doesn't apply his stacks (which it doesn't look like it does?)

1 + 50% of total AD isn't actually much unless you're jhin, and even then.

> [{quoted}](name=ChaosThief,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NJ5QwnUL,comment-id=000300010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-05T18:08:44.049+0000)
>
> It wouldn't be much damage though, if it doesn't apply his stacks (which it doesn't look like it does?)
> 
> 1 + 50% of total AD isn't actually much unless you're jhin, and even then.

.1 second cooldown.

> [{quoted}](name=Dicerson,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NJ5QwnUL,comment-id=0003000100000000000000000001,timestamp=2016-09-06T02:50:30.273+0000)
>
> .1 second cooldown.

{{champion:96}} is jealous...
I think you meant {{champion:30}}
I think you meant {{champion:53}}

> [{quoted}](name=ScarletNocturne,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NJ5QwnUL,comment-id=00030001000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-05T17:02:47.747+0000)
>
> the baron steal potential tho

We should make nasus's global shockwave do 1 + (50% of AD) + (50% of AP) + (50% of Nasus's Max Health) while we're at it
Why are you trying to think of buffs for the most cancerous champion in the game next to Garen?
Stop angering the boards against us. {{champion:157}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:245}}{{champion:96}}  are way more cancerous than Garen
Garen is only cancerous if you're playing some other cancerous manaless champ. Guess that makes him anti-cancer?
I thought Riven was the medicine against the cancer called Garen.
Garen shits on Riven in lane.

> [{quoted}](name=Reixis,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NJ5QwnUL,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2016-09-05T16:44:40.779+0000)
>
> That would deffinately be a very balanced and not at all broken addition to his Q.// Reixis says, dripping with sarcasm.
> 
> Contrary, i think he should have a cap to the stacks he can get.

if you wish to cap Nasus stacks, should cap Kalista rend, Sion Health from w, and Veigar q as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Grandpa Ulaenor,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NJ5QwnUL,comment-id=000300010002,timestamp=2016-09-06T02:56:56.876+0000)
>
> if you wish to cap Nasus stacks, should cap Kalista rend

I'll stop you right there, Kalista rend can only reach 255 stacks to prevent a stack (Pun not really intended) overflow.

http://i1.ytimg.com/vi/GD6qtc2_AQA/hqdefault.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=TheMinez,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NJ5QwnUL,comment-id=0003000100020000,timestamp=2016-09-06T12:58:52.796+0000)
>
> I'll stop you right there, Kalista rend can only reach 255 stacks to prevent a stack (Pun not really intended) overflow.
> 
> http://i1.ytimg.com/vi/GD6qtc2_AQA/hqdefault.jpg

i guess a cap was added because if i recall right it used to be limitless

> [{quoted}](name=Grandpa Ulaenor,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NJ5QwnUL,comment-id=000300010002,timestamp=2016-09-06T02:56:56.876+0000)
>
> if you wish to cap Nasus stacks, should cap Kalista rend, Sion Health from w, and Veigar q as well.

.... Kalistas rend is capped...

> [{quoted}](name=A Bad Mystic,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NJ5QwnUL,comment-id=0003000100020002,timestamp=2016-09-08T13:14:03.103+0000)
>
> .... Kalistas rend is capped...

i guess i never found out what the cap was let alone tested it i was under the guess it functioned like sion nasus and veigars

> [{quoted}](name=Grandpa Ulaenor,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NJ5QwnUL,comment-id=00030001000200020000,timestamp=2016-09-09T02:08:01.604+0000)
>
> i guess i never found out what the cap was let alone tested it i was under the guess it functioned like sion nasus and veigars

most things die before you stack it completely so it doesnt really matter tbh. but yeah its like 250-256 iirc
Veigar, yes. Kalista, meh you're most likely dead before she gets any decent amount of spears in you. Sion is also a bit meh, he's more than likely to be engaging than trying to stack his w.
if nasus had his stacks capped at any reasonable amount (meaning an amount he could actually achieve in 40 minutes) there would be no reason to pick him ever
unless they increased the amount of damage that stacks turn into.

> [{quoted}](name=ScarletNocturne,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NJ5QwnUL,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-09-05T14:54:13.321+0000)
>
> Nasus's Q should do AoE damage around the point of impact, its radius increasing with stacks.

I'm against this
Imagine him with IGB and the Q radius...gosh
This will give me nightmares

> [{quoted}](name=Trux Here,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NJ5QwnUL,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-09-05T15:26:30.422+0000)
>
> I'm against this
> Imagine him with IGB and the Q radius...gosh
> This will give me nightmares

exactly
That could ruin his stacks

naw. all on hit effects that proc AOE give nasus stacks for extra minions that it kills, and experienced nasus players are already used to using {{item:3025}}  to get as many minions as possible with 1 q
your trolling

> [{quoted}](name=maikokk,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NJ5QwnUL,comment-id=000300020000,timestamp=2016-09-05T20:28:33.293+0000)
>
> naw. all on hit effects that proc AOE give nasus stacks for extra minions that it kills, and experienced nasus players are already used to using {{item:3025}}  to get as many minions as possible with 1 q

That's complete bullshit lol. You must not have ever built IBG on Nasus. The Q only stacks with the single minion you target, you don't get Q stacks for AOE kills with IBG.

> [{quoted}](name=Astrophel,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NJ5QwnUL,comment-id=00030004,timestamp=2016-09-06T05:49:06.849+0000)
>
> {{item:3285}}

but Q doesn't do magic damage
That would actually make Nasus weaker since he would be unable to freeze waves, but it would sure be funny.

{{champion:75}} hm... still not good enough..
{{champion:268}} You just one shot Ezr-
{{champion:75}} NOT GOOD ENOUGH.

Sounds like me.
<goes back to lane to farm another 400 stacks.>
I do that sometimes, lol. Sometimes you just wanna see how much damage you do before you go back to farming.

> [{quoted}](name=PartyPanda12,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NJ5QwnUL,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-05T13:23:32.917+0000)
>
> I do that sometimes, lol. Sometimes you just wanna see how much damage you do before you go back to farming **champions**.

FTFY
SHUT DOWN!
It looks like someone is manipulating the dog's arm
Gake and fay
Keep his Q and update the rest of his outdated kit.
Why, his kit is perfect for him tbh.

I've never had that happen to me. However, I've done that several times to other players.
+6 for the kill
+1 for the post

i did this once. i could never get onto a teemo so i just flat out ignored him with good sustain in lane. after about 20 minutes of ignoring him he suddenly started just like NOT stopping AA ing me. like was giving up minions so i figured "oh hey. shit mo is trying to all in me. well i guess it came to this eventually" i just walked up waited for the blind to finish when my wither was on him. q. with sheen proc and 350 stacks . . . he lost half his health. he INSTANTLY flashed. like that damage spooked him.
Was this before or after you put down the armor shred?
